name: FPS Tech Demo
description:
• [WASD]: move
  • [ARROWS]/mouse: look
  • [SPACE]: jump
  • [E]/LMB: fire
  • [M]: catch mouse

Tiny First Person Shooter Tech Demo running on a custom game framework (YourGameLib). Physics based on Bullet.

This demo can be found in examples/, here: https://github.com/duddel/yourgamelib
